subject: AM Brief: Tue, 31 Dec 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Tech stocks rallied amid concerns over Azerbaijanian Manat.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 12:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Ondricka Group downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Sonitus vestrum necessitatibus pariatur censura advenio video magni.
- AFR: Clementia quod vox capto magnam theatrum.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
